meanings.definition: A session in which a group of people engage in discussion and activities to improve a piece of writing or other creative work.
meanings.sent1: During the workshopping, everyone shared their ideas for the story.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to our weekly workshopping sessions for feedback on my poems.
meanings.sent3: The workshopping turned into a lively debate about the characters' motivations.
meanings.sent4: Her workshopping was like a brainstorming whirlwind, sparking new ideas for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The workshopping helped us polish our play until it shone brightly on stage.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in a workshop or similar group activity to develop skills or knowledge.
meanings.sent1: His workshopping in the coding class helped him understand complex algorithms better.
meanings.sent2: She signed up for the painting workshopping to enhance her artistic techniques.
meanings.sent3: The workshopping on gardening techniques unexpectedly led to a hilarious plant potting race.
meanings.sent4: Their workshopping in the cooking class transformed them into culinary wizards.
meanings.sent5: The workshopping on public speaking boosted their confidence and eloquence.
